search_by_location.note: Can also use URL slug format: /in/{location_slug} for direct navigation

search_by_name.notes: Form fields: idmotsCles (keywords), idlieux (location). This is a POST form; results are provided via the site search landing endpoint.

category_or_location_browse.notes: Many static links for categories, professions and regions use path-based slugs and numeric facet ids (s..., v...). These are GET browse endpoints rather than a free-text query parameter.

Buenos Aires Stock Exchang] || Buenos Aires Stock Exchange.Offers information for publicly shared companies and an overview of the stock exchange. Company data can be accessed under "societies," where the companies list can be searched by name and "symbol;" the alphabetic code used on the stock exchange. Company information includes shares, address and directors. || Yes || No || Yes ||  || Needed || A corporate profile report can be purchased from companydocuments.com for GBP 195.00.
